mapper.insert: insert into blacklist (blacklist_seq, m_id, black_m_id, black_content) values (seq_blacklist.nextval,#{m_id},#{black_m_id},#{black_content})
mapper.select: select * from blacklist order by black_is_processed asc, black_regdate desc

select * from blacklist
where black_regdate < sysdate - 10
select count(*) from blacklist where black_is_processed = 'N'
